rawText:
SURIYAKANTH M
9952419581
suriyakanth7717@gmail.com
PROJECTS 
INTERN
PUBLICATIONS
ONLINE EXAMINATION PORTAL  
             Using  PHP,  MySQL,  JavaScript,  I  developed  a  secure  online
examination  portal  with  automatic  exam  submission  using  the
Page Visibility API to prevent tab switching and malpractice.    
FACE VERIFIED ATTENDANCE SYSTEM USING DJANGO 
       Attendance  system  with  barcode  scanning  and  facial
recognition for proper student verification. Added Background tasks
for automated monitoring. 
             I finished my internship at Meganar Technologies, Madurai
as a UI/UX designer from December 2024 to April 2025. I worked on
a  project  called  Media  Jungle,  an  OTT  platform.  I  created
wireframes, user flows, and prototypes, and worked closely with the
team to design the app and understand what users need to make
it easy to use.
FOSTERING EMOTIONAL INTELLIGENCE IN EDUCATIONAL
ENVIRONMENT 
Jan 2024 
     Developed a face detection and emotion analysis application
using Python, CNN, and Haar cascade to identify emotional states
(happy, sad, disgusted, neutral, surprised, angry). And received Best
Paper Award at the conference for innovative research applications
EMOTION GUIDED ATTENDACE SYSTEM  
April 2024 
     I extended the face detection and emotion analysis application
to identify  students  and  record  their  attendance  based  on  their
facial emotional state. 
OBJECTIVE 
Passionate and punctual individual with an MCA degree, skilled in Web Development, data analysis,
UI/UX design and research, and machine learning. Strong at understanding users, designing easy-
to-use interfaces, and analyzing data to find useful insights. Looking for an entry-level role to apply
my skills and contribute to meaningful projects.
B.Sc IT
Sri Kaliswari College
2020 - 2023
7.7 CGPA
8.0 CGPA
Ayya Nadar Janaki Ammal College
MCA
2023 - 2025
Ayya Nadar Janaki Ammal College
Diploma in AI and ML
2023 - 2024
EDUCATION
EXPERTISE
Web Designing
UI/UX Research and Design 
React JS
Problem Solving and Analysis
Graphic Design
Machine Learning
Python
Node JS
PHP
MS Office
